channel.title: Changing NPC EXP Rate
channel.description: All I can do is change the range, attack, hp, str, defence. I can't change the Mage, Thieve and all the other Non-Combat Stats. Can someone please help me? I have changed all the [code]TotalExp = (double)[/code]

item.title: Changing NPC EXP Rate
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

For magic you need to go to the spell and change the xp for it. it should look something like 350*hitdiff or something like that

Read full topic
